revised_title: Stephen Denis Garrett's Life and Contributions to Science
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Stephen Denis Garrett, a notable figure in the field of plant pathology and ecology. Garrett made significant contributions to the understanding of plant diseases and fungal ecology, and his work laid the foundation for future research in these areas. He also had a strong interest in mycology and botany, which he pursued as a hobby during his time at Cambridge.
